scripts.dev:start: npm run dev:status || npm run dev
scripts.dev:daemon: nohup npm run dev > dev-server.log 2>&1 & echo $! > .pidfile && echo 'Server started in background with PID: '$(cat .pidfile)
scripts.dev:stop: [ -f .pidfile ] && kill $(cat .pidfile) && rm .pidfile && echo 'Server stopped' || echo 'No server running'
scripts.dev:restart: npm run dev:stop && sleep 2 && npm run dev:start
scripts.dev:status: [ -f .pidfile ] && ps -p $(cat .pidfile) > /dev/null 2>&1 && echo 'Server running (PID: '$(cat .pidfile)')' || echo 'No server running'
scripts.dev:logs: [ -f dev-server.log ] && tail -f dev-server.log || echo 'No log file found'
scripts.dev:logs:tail: [ -f dev-server.log ] && tail -n 100 dev-server.log || echo 'No log file found'
scripts.dev:clean: pkill -f 'next.*3001' 2>/dev/null || true && rm -f .pidfile && echo 'Cleaned up processes'
scripts.dev:kill-port: lsof -ti:3001 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || echo 'Port 3001 already free'
scripts.validate:env: node -e "const e=require('fs').readFileSync('.env.local','utf8'); if(e.includes('your_')) {console.error('⚠️  WARNING: Placeholder values found in .env.local'); process.exit(1);} else {console.log('✅ Environment variables validated');}"
scripts.test:all: npm run test:fields && npm run test:integration
